attributes.action: tax buy to let properties as if they were any other for of investement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Buytolet should be made unattrative to give first time buyers a chance at owning  a home.

A buy to let property, should be taxed as all other for of investemt are, at present these 'people' are able to siphon thousands of pounds that should go to the government (capital gains tax based on the value of the property for that year, 35% witholding tax etc..)
